long_description: With a magnet-based interchangeable lens system and fresh style, the Anon M1 Premium snow goggles will have you looking the part as you carve up the mountain. Cobalt Smoke lens has a dark gray tint with 6% visible light transmission (VLT) to maximize color definition and increase depth perception in medium to bright light. Included Blue Lagoon spare lens has a high-contrast yellow tint, 68% VLT and a multilayer blue mirror finish to enhance color definition and increase contrast in low light. Interchangeable lens design features magnets in the frame and lenses, making it a simple process to swap lenses without taking the goggles off your face. To swap lenses, simply pull one lens out and snap the new one in-the magnets automatically guide and hold the lens in position. Large spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design fits medium-size faces; goggles come with a protective nylon case and microfiber storage bag. As part of the Anon Premium series, the M1 Premium goggles feature the latest in high-resolution graphics and detailed frame and strap finishes.
